content.title: 🔥 Big News, Backers! 🔥
content.creator:
SLAM Innovation
February 11, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We’re beyond excited to share that the SLAM XCAM will be shipping with full support for built in Deepseek AI’s cutting-edge large model! 🚀 This is a GAME-CHANGER for creators like you! 🎬
Your 8K VR180 3D creations are about to reach a whole new level of brilliance. ✨
Thank you for being part of this journey. The future of immersive content creation is here, and YOU are helping make it a reality! 💥 Stay tuned for even more mind-blowing updates! 🙌"
Have a nice day!
  SLAM XCAM Team

comments.text: What is the advantage here? Is it improving image quality or something?

The Deepseek AI model is deployed locally on the SLAM XCAM, so you won’t need an internet connection to use it. It’s all powered directly from the camera, providing seamless, offline AI capabilities right at your fingertips. 🚀📸"

content.title: 🚀 Exciting News! SLAM XCAM Reviewed by Hugh Hou! 🎥✨
content.creator:
SLAM Innovation
January 29, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
Great news! SLAM XCAM has been reviewed by @Hugh Hou, and we’re thrilled to see his objective and professional insights on our product. It’s amazing to have such recognition, and we truly appreciate his support! 🙌🔥
🔗 Watch the review here: 
Your support has made this journey possible, and we can’t wait to bring SLAM XCAM to your hands soon! 
Let us know your thoughts in the comments! 💙
Best Regards
SLAM X Cam Team

comments.text: Congratulations. Can you keep us updated on any improvements to the camera based on Hugh’s comments re: syncing issues between lenses? Thanks
Hi Alex, Thanks for comment, we will have an important update after CNY. Will keep you posted. Thanks
Hi Alex， Our Engineer team already fixed this issue, latest footage here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EINQ3MSL3izT94hDk0khmRJKm6bylkR0/view?usp=sharing
not sure it is fixed stretched perhaps? at 10s it was quite different

content.title: 🚀 XCAM Update: Enhanced Experience & New Media Release! 🎉
content.creator:
SLAM Innovation
January 20, 2025
content.content:
Dear backers,
We’re excited to share that the XCAM has recently undergone significant adjustments and optimization of its camera settings, resulting in a much-improved user experience! 📸✨
To showcase these improvements, we’re happy to release new photos and videos, all captured with the latest camera parameters and software. You can check them out here:
🔗 New Media Folder
Your continued support is what drives us to innovate and move forward. We truly appreciate all of your valuable feedback and suggestions. 🙏 Thank you for being part of this journey with us!
Stay tuned for more updates!
Warm regards,
The XCAM Team

comments.text: Dear Peter, We will update specifically for Audio next week. Please follow us for the update. Thanks. BR xCAM Team

content.title: Thank You, Backers! Greetings from CES 2025 🎉
content.creator:
SLAM Innovation
January 9, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We want to express our heartfelt gratitude for your incredible support and trust in SLAM XCAM. Your enthusiasm drives us to push boundaries and deliver the best.
This week, we’re thrilled to be in Las Vegas at the 2025 CES Exhibition, showcasing our innovative 8K VR180 3D camera to the world. The response has been overwhelming, with fans and creators alike embracing SLAM XCAM with open arms!
To share this exciting journey with you, we’ve captured some stunning 8K photos right here at the event. Feel free to download and enjoy them:
👉 Click to View & Download Photos
Thank you once again for being part of this incredible journey. We’re excited about what’s ahead and will keep you updated every step of the way!
Warm regards,
The SLAM XCAM Team
